name: The Darkening
description:
frhfrjfckfrckfrfcfihmhfjefncn is a cute little insect of breed efncsjcnfkfclcfclj (yes that's his name and breed).

you are his owner (and he's your pet, not vice versa) 

and he's got a virus which is need-some-lights-to-live-or-ill-die-o-phobia (yes that's a virus and not phobia).

the vet prescribes a trillion light bulbs or he'll die of need-some-lights-to-live-or-ill-die-o-phobia.

but you realize he has only 9999 shrekies (yes that's a measuring unit of time) and you need to feed him a trillion light bulbs or 

he'll die of need-some-lights-to-live-or-ill-die-o-phobia.

if not a trillion light bulbs, at least feed him as many light bulbs as possible so he's happy while dying

that's the concept cuz yes

(the names I wrote are totally yes'nt  random and I totally yes'nt banged my keyboard like hell)(^_^)(now don't watch the CCTV)

made for zenojam hosted by zenogamedev

btw pls download the game (this isn't a horror game and totally does not contain traces of light mode as shown in screenshots(photoshop scemers hecked me and posted that))
